Question
========

A person achieves a score of 9.1 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 7.4 with a standard deviation 3.1. The z-score of the person with 9.1 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.54
* -0.06
* 0.55

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.54: Incorrect
-0.06: Incorrect
* 0.55: Correct
